dashboard.title: Home
dashboard.subtitle: Choose action for PDF manipulation:
dashboard.footer: Click on one of the options above to start working with PDF files.
profile.title: Profile
navbar.history.title: History
profile.information.title: Profile Information
profile.information.subtitle: Update your account's profile information and email address.
profile.information.name: Name
profile.information.email.resend: Click here to re-send the verification email.
profile.information.email.verification: A new verification link has been sent to your email address.
profile.api.title: Generate API token
profile.api.subtitle: Generates token for accessing rest API without the web application
profile.api.button.label: API token
profile.password.title: Update Password
profile.password.subtitle: Ensure your account is using a long, random password to stay secure.
profile.delete.title: Delete Account
profile.delete.subtitle: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Before deleting your account, please download any data or information that you wish to retain.
profile.delete.confirmation.title: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
profile.delete.confirmation.subtitle: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Please enter your password to confirm you would like to permanently delete your account.
guide.title: User Guide
guide.section.title: How to use CookedPDF
guide.section.subtitle: Designed for simple and fast PDF processing.
guide.login.title: Login and Registration
guide.login.subtitle: The user must register or log in (Google login is also available). After logging in, access to their CookedPDF workspace is granted.
guide.home.title: Home Page
guide.home.subtitle: Displays available PDF manipulation actions. The user can choose the action they wish to perform.
guide.extract.title: Extract Pages
guide.extract.subtitle: Select specific pages from a PDF and save them as a new file.
guide.merge.title: Merge PDF
guide.merge.subtitle: Combine multiple PDF files into one document.
guide.split.title: Split PDF
guide.split.subtitle: Divide a PDF into several parts based on page numbers or chunk size.
guide.encrypt.title: Encrypt PDF
guide.encrypt.subtitle: Protect a PDF file with a password against unauthorized access.
guide.decrypt.title: Decrypt PDF
guide.decrypt.subtitle: Remove password protection from an encrypted PDF file.
guide.delete.title: Delete Pages
guide.delete.subtitle: Remove selected pages from a PDF document.
guide.rotate.title: Rotate Pages
guide.rotate.subtitle: Rotate PDF pages to the desired orientation.
guide.reorder.title: Reorder PDF
guide.reorder.subtitle: Change the order of pages in a PDF by rearranging them easily.
guide.add-page.title: Add Page
guide.add-page.subtitle: Insert one or more pages into an existing PDF file.
guide.extract-text.title: Extract Text
guide.extract-text.subtitle: Retrieve plain text from a PDF document as a .txt file.
guide.docs.title: Documentation
guide.docs.subtitle: Technical API description: list of endpoints, methods, and their usage.
guide.history.title: History
guide.history.subtitle: Displays the history of all user-performed actions or login history. Admin can delete full history or specific entries.
